website_summaries.verdict: While most people who buy a weighted hula hoop will use it and hope for the best over time, the VHOOP makes it incredibly easy to precisely track your daily fitness goals, including calories burned, number of hoop rotations, and overall exercise time.
pros: Monitors daily exercise, workout history, and your rank among all global users
Companion app compatible with iOS and Android devices
cons: VHOOP is undoubtedly the most expensive weighted hula hoop available, but then again, it is the only smart weighted hula hoop on the market

customer_reviews.title: Painful
customer_reviews.text: I like how well it connects to the app, but there's no way I could do a 30 minute workout with this, much less a 10 minute workout because it HURTS like crazy! Why are there these bumps everywhere?! It would probably be less painful if the bumps were not there. Seriously, who can do this long enough to get real exercise?
customer_reviews.author: Christina O.

customer_reviews.title: Burn burn burn
customer_reviews.text: I have been hooping for about 5 years now. Saw this product and decided to purchase because of the app benefits. I really like this hoop because you can add ir subtract the weights if you purchase the combo like I did. The only thing I expected to be different as said was the comfort around your waist or area after your session. I am still sore afterwards but it could be because I hoop daily for 1 hour nonstop and go at high speed intervals as well. But for a beginner hoopist this may be a little intimidating at first. But no pain. No gain.
customer_reviews.author: LaVise

customer_reviews.title: Better Than regular hola hoops
customer_reviews.text: I like that it came in a case and bag where I can just storage immediately after I’m done working out, so far I have not used it so much but I like it cause you can customized the weight
customer_reviews.author: julia ayala

customer_reviews.title: LISTEN! THIS HOOP IS FOR PEOPLE WHO ARE LIVING IN THE OFFICE 24/7!!
customer_reviews.text: FALKS! CHECK THIS OUT! I'M A SUPER WORKAHOLIC AND I DO NOT HAVE TIME FOR GOING TO GYM FOR WORK OUT AND I HAVE BEEN GOING BUSINESS TRIPS MORE THAN 10 TIMES A YEAR. THIS HOOP IS PORTABLE AND IT LITTLE BIT HURTS YOUR BELLY BUT IT DOES'T MEAN THAT IT SCRATCHES YOUR BODY OR ANYTHING LIKE THAT. IT MAKES ME FEEL LIKE IT IS BURNING MY FAT. WHEN YOU SEE YOUR IMPROVEMENT THROUGH THE APP, IT DEFINITELY MOTIVATES YOU KEEP USING IT. DEFINITELY HANDS DOWN.
customer_reviews.author: Jin Oh

customer_reviews.title: Might work for you.
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t get them to stay above my hip bones. Maybe I’m not shaped right for them to work.
customer_reviews.author: ClayTwo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I like how it look and easy to assemble and disassemble, but It is not easy to put the weight on the hoop. I had to use a lot of force to put it on. All in all, Its a very good product and I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Tai P Hua

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced hula hoop, app never works
customer_reviews.text: The app doesn’t work. I’m sure the hula hoop is great, but without the app it’s just an overpriced hula hoop.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with app. Material and shape hurts body.
customer_reviews.text: App is awful. Trouble connecting BT, and once I did, it still crashed the app. Hoop itself is hard and hurts compared to my regular weighted hoop. Can’t find help resources so will likely return it.
customer_reviews.author: Kecia Kesler

customer_reviews.title: App doesnt track properly
customer_reviews.text: The app doesn't work after 3 uses. And can easily bruise, there needs to be a belt worn with this hula hoop.
customer_reviews.author: Sadaf K

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & already feeling good!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It’s been almost a week since I started using this every morning and I’m feeling good, feeling the difference already! Plus this thing is so sturdy yet so light. Love the app, my friends and I are so competitive!
customer_reviews.author: John H.

customer_reviews.title: Parts Missing
customer_reviews.text: We did not receive the carrying case or the weights for the hula hoop.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Roloff

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This hoop is well weighted to make for a good workout. The way it divides also makes for good portability when I want to exercise outside of my own home. Since I can change the weight of this product, it makes for good variation in my workouts, whether I want a more intense or less intense workout. The way it also connects to my phone to track how many calories I burned and the amount of repetition I've done is useful to keep track of my workout. All in all, Its a very good product and I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine, now won’t hold a charge?
customer_reviews.text: Bought this last year thru Indiegogo. Liked it and it was working well - now it only connects to the app when connected to the charger (which makes it impossible to use); doesn’t seem to be holding a charge otherwise now. Not sure what to do?
customer_reviews.author: LPC
